jee.title: JEE Main
jee.syllabus: Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics from Class 11 and 12 NCERT curriculum.
jee.month: Two sessions â€” January and April

examPattern.questions: 75 questions (25 each in Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics)
examPattern.markingScheme: +4 for correct answer, -1 for incorrect answer. No negative for numerical type questions (20 MCQs, 5 Numerical).

jee.attempts: Twice a year; no restriction on number of attempts across years.

qualifyingCriteria.marks: Minimum 75% aggregate (65% for SC/ST) in 12th or Top 20 percentile in board.

jee-advanced.title: JEE Advanced
jee-advanced.syllabus: Advanced topics in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics beyond JEE Main level.

examPattern.questionTypes: MCQs, numerical answer, and matching type questions.
examPattern.markingScheme: Varies; includes negative marking of -1 or -2 for incorrect answers.

jee-advanced.attempts: Maximum of two attempts in two consecutive years.

qualifyingCriteria.marks: 75% in 12th PCM (65% SC/ST/PwD) or top 20 percentile in board.

mht-cet.title: MHT-CET (PCM)
mht-cet.syllabus: Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics from Maharashtra Board's Class 11 (20%) and Class 12 (80%) syllabus.

examPattern.markingScheme: +2 for Mathematics, +1 for Physics & Chemistry; No negative marking.

bitsat.title: BITSAT
bitsat.syllabus: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics/Biology, English Proficiency, and Logical Reasoning (Class 11 & 12 NCERT).

examPattern.totalMarks: 390 Marks (Physics & Chemistry 90 each, Maths/Bio 120, English 30, LR 60)

qualifyingCriteria.marks: 75% in PCM, 60% individually in each subject.

viteee.title: VITEEE
viteee.syllabus: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics/Biology, English, and Aptitude (Class 11 & 12).

neet.title: NEET-UG
neet.syllabus: Physics, Chemistry, and Biology (Botany & Zoology) from Class 11 & 12 NCERT.

qualifyingCriteria.marks: Minimum 50% aggregate (40% for SC/ST, 45% for PWD).
